TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DisplayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DisplayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DisplayAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 提供一般用途屬性，可讓您為實體部分類別的類型和成員指定可當地語系化的字串。

span.span: Provides a general-purpose attribute that lets you specify localizable strings for types and members of entity partial classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別的屬性可用於做為常值或做為資源識別碼指定執行個體。The properties of this class can be used either as literals or as resource identifiers for a specified instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化， ， ，和屬性設為空字串。The constructor initializes the , , , and properties to an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoGenerateField { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 UI 是否應該自動產生以顯示這個欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether UI should be generated automatically in order to display this field.

value.span: 如果 UI 應該自動產生以顯示這個欄位，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if UI should be generated automatically to display this field; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿使用這個屬性來存取屬性。Do not use this property to access the property. 請改用 方法。Use the method instead.

exception.span: 在設定屬性值之前嘗試取得屬性值。

span.span: An attempt was made to get the property value before it was set.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoGenerateFilter { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否會針對此欄位自動顯示篩選 UI。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether filtering UI is automatically displayed for this field.

value.span: 如果 UI 應該自動產生以顯示這個欄位的篩選，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if UI should be generated automatically to display filtering for this field; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得的值，不使用這個屬性屬性。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 請改用 方法。Use the method instead. 設定這個屬性會覆寫指定哪些資料行做為篩選器隨附的預設行為。Setting this property overrides the default behavior for specifying which columns are included as filters. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何停用 Employee1 欄位的篩選條件。The following example shows how to disable the filter for the Employee1 field. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

exception.span: 在設定屬性值之前嘗試取得屬性值。

span.span: An attempt was made to get the property value before it was set.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 UI 中用來顯示描述的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used to display a description in the UI.

value.span: UI 中用來顯示描述的值。

span.span: The value that is used to display a description in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得的值，不使用這個屬性屬性。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 請改用 方法。Use the method instead. 屬性通常是為工具提示或說明 UI 項目繫結到使用這個屬性的成員。The property is typically used as a tooltip or description UI element that is bound to the member using this attribute. 動態資料 Edit.ascx 範本會顯示為工具提示文字輸入欄位中的描述。The Dynamic Data Edit.ascx template will display the description as a tooltip in text-entry fields. A`null`值或空字串是否有效。A `null` value or empty string is valid. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常用於工具提示的方式已標註這個屬性的屬性。The property is typically used as a tooltip for the property that is annotated with this attribute.

returns.span: 如果已指定 屬性而且 屬性表示資源索引鍵時，則為 屬性的當地語系化字串，否則為 屬性的非當地語系化值。

span.span: The localized string for the property, if the property has been specified and the property represents a resource key; otherwise, the non-localized value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱通常用於做為欄位標籤 UI 項目繫結至已標註具有屬性屬性。The name is typically used as the field label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with the property. A`null`值或空字串是否有效。A `null` value or empty string is valid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Nullable`1<int32> GetOrder() cil managed
Public Function GetOrder () As Nullable(Of Integer)

span.span: Returns the value of the property.

returns.span: 如果 屬性已設定，則為此屬性的值，否則為 。

span.span: The value of the property, if it has been set; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定的順序，展示層應該考慮將設定的值10000 的屬性。If an order is not specified, presentation layers should consider setting the value of the property to 10000. 此值可讓明確排序的欄位之前和之後的欄位沒有指定的順序顯示。This value lets explicitly-ordered fields be displayed before and after the fields that do not have a specified order.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetPrompt() cil managed

span.span: Returns the value of the property.

returns.span: 如果已指定 屬性而且 屬性表示資源索引鍵時，則會取得 屬性的當地語系化字串，否則取得 屬性的非當地語系化值。

span.span: Gets the localized string for the property if the property has been specified and if the property represents a resource key; otherwise, the non-localized value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常用於做為提示字元或標準繫結至已標註具有屬性的 UI 項目屬性。The property is typically used as a prompt or watermark for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetShortName() cil managed

span.span: Returns the value of the property.

returns.span: 如果已指定 屬性而且 屬性表示資源索引鍵時，則為 屬性的當地語系化字串，否則為 屬性的非當地語系化值。

span.span: The localized string for the property if the property has been specified and if the property represents a resource key; otherwise, the non-localized value of the value property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簡短名稱作為方格資料行標籤 UI 項目繫結至已標註這個屬性的屬性。The short name is used as the grid column label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 這個屬性會傳回常值、 非當地語系化的字串或當地語系化的字串如果不`null`。This property returns either the literal, non-localized string, or a localized string if is not `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ GroupName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來將 UI 欄位分組的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used to group fields in the UI.

value.span: 用來將 UI 欄位分組的值。

span.span: A value that is used to group fields in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得的值，不使用這個屬性屬性。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 請改用 方法。Use the method instead. A`null`值或空字串是否有效。A `null` value or empty string is valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 UI 中用於顯示的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used for display in the UI.
A value that is used for display in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得的值，不使用這個屬性屬性。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 請改用 方法。Use the method instead. 名稱通常是做為欄位標籤 UI 項目的繫結至已標註這個屬性的屬性。The name is typically used as the field label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 動態資料 List.aspx、 ListDetails.aspx 和 Details.aspx 頁面範本使用欄位標籤的屬性。The Dynamic Data List.aspx, ListDetails.aspx, and Details.aspx page templates use the property for the field label. A`null`值或空字串是否有效。A `null` value or empty string is valid. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 name 屬性。The following example shows how to set the name property. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Order { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行的順序加權。

span.span: Gets or sets the order weight of the column.
The order weight of the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以遞增的順序值為基礎的順序來排序資料行。Columns are sorted in increasing order based on the order value. 若沒有這個屬性的資料行具有 0 的順序值。Columns without this attribute have an order value of 0. 負數的值有效，且可用來將所有的非負數資料行之前的資料行。Negative values are valid and can be used to position a column before all non-negative columns. 如果未指定的順序，展示層應該考慮使用值為 10000。If an order is not specified, presentation layers should consider using the value 10000. 此值可讓明確排序的欄位之前和之後的欄位沒有指定的順序顯示。This value lets explicitly-ordered fields be displayed before and after the fields that do not have a specified order. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何將 [LastName] 欄位的順序加權設定-9。The following example shows how to set the order weight of the LastName field to -9. 實體中的其他欄位具有零的預設順序權數。The other fields in the entity have the default order weight of zero. 因此，會先顯示 [姓氏] 欄位。Therefore, the LastName field will be displayed first. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Prompt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 UI 中用來設定提示浮水印的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that will be used to set the watermark for prompts in the UI.

value.span: UI 中用來顯示浮水印的值。

span.span: A value that will be used to display a watermark in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性通常用於做為提示字元或浮水印 UI 項目繫結至已標註這個屬性的屬性。This property is typically used as a prompt or watermark for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 請勿使用這個方法來存取提示字串。Do not use this method to access the prompt string. 請改用 方法。Use the method instead. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定「 輸入 Last Name 」 的屬性。The following example shows how to set the property to "Enter Last Name". ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ ResourceType { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定型別，其中包含 、、 和 等屬性的資源。

span.span: Gets or sets the type that contains the resources for the , , , and properties.

value.span: 包含 、、 和 屬性在內的資源型別。

span.span: The type of the resource that contains the , , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此值為`null`、 ， ， ，和屬性會假設常值、 非當地語系化的字串。If this value is `null`, the , , , and properties are assumed to be literal, non-localized strings. 如果此值不是`null`，字串屬性會假設公用靜態屬性會傳回實際字串值的名稱。If this value is not `null`, the string properties are assumed to be the names of public static properties that return the actual string value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ShortName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於方格資料行標籤的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used for the grid column label.

value.span: 用於方格資料行標籤的值。

span.span: A value that is for the grid column label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簡短名稱作為方格資料行標籤 UI 項目繫結至已標註這個屬性的屬性。The short name is used as the grid column label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 動態資料 Insert.aspx 和 Edit.aspx 頁面範本使用欄位標籤。The Dynamic Data Insert.aspx and Edit.aspx page templates use the for the field label. 這個屬性會傳回的當地語系化的字串如果指定屬性，而且當屬性表示的資源索引鍵。This property returns the localized string for if the property has been specified and if the property represents a resource key. 如果未指定屬性或屬性不是資源的索引鍵，這個屬性會傳回未當地語系化的字串。If the property has not been specified or if the property is not a resource key, this property returns a non-localized string.
